Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jug
Description: Jug with a cylindrical body, ring base and a medium high narrow neck. There is a continuous design on the shoulder, just above a  dark brown double horizontal band that  delineates the upper section of the body. Similar bands also delineate the lower section.
